package.name: Customer_Cancel_Order_From_My_Account
package.summary: Customer order cancel from my account is an open-source Magento module developed by Commerce Bees. The primary focus of the module is used to cancel the order from my account page by the users.
package.description: Order can cancel by the user from the my accout section under my order tab. Order cancellation is possible only for the pending order status. Once order status moved from pending to any other status it will show order cancellation not available. Notification will shown to the user in the my order page.
package.notes: The first Version of customer cancel order from my account.
